name: ùïÑùîºùîæùî∏ùïäùïãùî∏‚Ñù ùïåùïäùîº‚ÑùùîπùïÜùïã
description: The best userbot made by Team Megastar, For Support Join @MEGASTAR_SUPPORT

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

F_BAN_LOGGER_GROUP.description: Put Group id Same As PRIVATE_GROUP_ID.

ALIVE_NAME.description: Fill your Full name or Username like @none1p or @Kkchoudhary3108.

ALIVE_MSG.description: Set Custom awake Message When entering .awake command.

ALIVE_PIC.description: put here any telegraph media link for .awake cmd.

BIO_MSG.description: Put Your Telegram Bio Here Required For Auto Bio.

PMPERMIT_PIC.description: put here any telegraph media link for pmpermit custom pic.

PM_PERMIT_GROUP_ID.description: Put an Group Id Same As PRIVATE_GROUP_ID Required For Pmpermit plugin.

APP_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Putting Others Value may result In Account Ban.. so don't be stupid.

REM_BG_API_KEY.description: Required for Removing image background functionality. Get from https://www.remove.bg/

LYDIA_API_KEY.description: Needed for Lydia AI. Follow https://telegra.ph/Lydia-09-05 to get your API.

GITA_CLIENT_ID.description: Needed for gita plugin. Follow https://bhagavadgita.io to get your.

GITA_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Needed for gita plugin. Follow https://bhagavadgita.io to get your.

OCR_SPACE_API_KEY.description: Register an account on ocr.space to get this value(API key)....

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Putting Others Value May result In Account Ban..so don't be stupid.

PLUGIN_CHANNEL.description: Create a private group add rose  then type /id. PLUGIN_CHANNEL and PRIVATE_GROUP_ID both values should be same

PRIVATE_GROUP_BOT_API_ID.description: create a private channel and then type any message and forward it to @ShowJsonBot.. you'll get many IDs but copy that one which precedes 'forward_from_chat' then paste here

PRIVATE_GROUP_ID.description: Create a private group add rose bot then type /id. PLUGIN_CHANNEL and PRIVATE_GROUP_ID both values should be same

PM_LOGGR_BOT_API_ID.description: for login private messages create a private channel and then type any message and forward it to @ShowJsonBot.. you'll get many IDs but copy that one which precedes 'forward_from_chat' then paste here

STRING_SESSION.description: Get this value by running https://repl.it/@bristi648/megastar/

GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Your Github Access Token for gitcommit plugin.Google 'Github access token' to find.

GIT_REPO_NAME.description: Your repo name Example: aritramandal/MEGASTAR , but GITHUB_ACCESS_TOKEN must be setup first.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API.Required for updater to work.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top.Required for updater to work.

TG_BOT_TOKEN_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at http://telegram.dog/BotFather and get the token of your bot. And Don't Forget To Turn on inline Mode on bot settings. Get it.

CHROME_BIN.description: For Carbon.py. Leave as it is.

CHROME_DRIVER.description: For Carbon.py. Leave as it is.

TG_BOT_USER_NAME_BF_HER.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at http://telegram.dog/BotFather and get the username of your bot

DOWNLOAD_PFP_URL_CLOCK.description: Needed for autopic module. A url that is a preview link of your Profile Pic

NO_OF_BUTTONS_DISPLAYED_IN_H_ME_CMD.description: Set The Amount Of Buttons Displayed In Help Command

NO_OF_COLUMS_DISPLAYED_IN_H_ME_CMD.description: Set The Amount Of Rows You Want To Displayed In Help Command default 2

EMOJI_TO_DISPLAY_IN_HELP.description: Set The emojies You Want to Add In Help Command!!

PM_SECURITY.description: If you don't want pm security write 'DISABLE' otherwise leave it blank

TZ.description: Required for Correct Time for autopic get from http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone.tzc

REDIRECTCHANNEL.description: Put You Channel Username Reflecting Your Info or Your Tags Etc

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: The number of processes to run.
